flawed_nl_solution:
The season is broken up into 22/2=<<22/2=11>>11 episode based on cost
The first 11 episodes cost 11*1000=$<<11*1000=11000>>11000
The next set of episodes cost 1000*1.2=$<<1000*1.2=2100>>2100 more per episode
So they cost 1000+2100=$<<1000+2100=3100>>3100 each
So in total they cost 3100*11=$<<3100*11=34100>>34100
So in total the season cost 34100+11000=$<<34100+11000=45100>>45100

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 1200.0, not 2100.0. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
